Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Too bad about this weather, huh? Dark
skies always put me in a bleak mood.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Uh-oh. You're carrying around so many
eggs already. Do you really have room for
any of mine?<sp:0:4:0>My prized eggs need their space. <sp:5:0:0>I'll give
you one if you come back later, OK?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, there I go making promises again.<sp:5:0:0>
Try and forget what happened between
us today...
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And who might you be?<sp:0:4:0>Just kidding. They say a Cucco's memory
only lasts for three steps, but my memory
is better than that.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Three days, though, and there might be a problem...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0700>Besides, nights have been unexpectedly
busy for me ever since I took over for my
husband while he's at Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>The only Cuccos I have time for here are
the eggs.<sp:0:4:0>If you need something in the village,
you'll probably find it along the main
thoroughfare.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My son and I guard the gate in shifts, so
I'm on my way to the <clr:0000>village entrance<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>He's been watching my husband work as
the gatekeeper for a long time, so he's
pretty good at it when it's his turn.<sp:0:4:0>I feel bad when it comes time for a
scaredy-cat like me to <clr:0000>guard the gate<clr:ffff>.
But I can't let a little kid do all the work.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm headed back home. Someone needs
to look after the Cuccos.<sp:0:4:0>My son, Teebo, does a great job as the
village <clr:0000>gatekeeper<clr:ffff>, so it's not like I need
to be there anyway.<sp:0:4:0>I guess he thinks he needs to live up to
his father's example, since my husband
went to work at Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>He takes it all very seriously. He even
shows people around town, just like he
says a real <clr:0000>gatekeeper <clr:ffff>should.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We did have more Cuccos here once,
but we couldn't make time to take care
of them.<sp:0:4:0>Most of the ones we have left are kept
at <clr:0000>the barn at the top of the hill<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, but if you'd like to take any of the
eggs here with you, I don't mind at all.<sp:0:4:0>The Cuccos produce so many eggs that
there's plenty for everyone.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's too early to be as awake as you. I'm
still so tired...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The sun shows no mercy from its sky
throne. I hope evening comes soon.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The sun's gone down, I see.<sp:0:4:0>But the Cece stuff around the village still
makes everything seem so bright.
Talk_40: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Who is this freak?!<clr:ffff><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Uh, hey there. What brings you to town?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Look, it doesn't matter how handsome
you are, or how many times you swing by
to chat. I'm not giving you any more eggs.<sp:0:4:0>Just forget me...
Near_05: Maybe if I hold real still...
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your heart is like a Cucco's egg—the taste
is heavenly, but it's all eaten up before
you know it.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Eek, he's talking to me...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>So, uh. Is there anything special bringing
you to <clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>at this hour?<sp:0:4:0>All we have are <clr:0000>veggies<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>'s fashion,
and...<sp:5:1:0>just those two things, really.<sp:0:4:0>So, y'know. <sp:5:1:0>Not much point attacking
our homes or anything.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, did you make some room? OK then,
a promise is a promise. One egg, just
for you.
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still...no matter how good-looking you
might be, I can't let you have any more
of my prized eggs.<sp:0:4:0>Do us both a favor and...forget me...
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm. You haven't made room like I asked,
huh? That's fine. I'll keep sitting on this
egg as long as it takes.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Your heart is like a Cucco's egg—easily
given but easy to break.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, hi again.<sp:0:4:0>I was afraid you were up to no good,
coming to the village at this hour.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>You swept me off my feet so fast that I
gave you one of my prized eggs!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>No more though... Just forget what
happened here today.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm cleaning up to take my mind off
things until morning comes.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>At first light, it'll be my son <clr:0000>Teebo<clr:ffff>'s turn
to take over on watch duty.<sp:0:4:0>He does the job more like my husband
used to do.<sp:0:4:0>Checking for suspicious people, <clr:0000>guiding
visitors around the village<clr:ffff>, that sort
of thing.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Please, find it in your heart to forget what
happened today.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Just my luck that it's raining. I hope my
li'l Cuccos aren't wet and sad.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>Hm. This isn't working.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I was wondering whether it was possible
to romanticize eggs.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But in the end, eggs are something you
cook and eat for breakfast, and that's it.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I feel like you weren't getting what I was
going for there. Way to kill the mood.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, uh, did you still need something?
I need to hurry and relieve my son from
his shift.<sp:0:4:0>He's been watching my husband work as
the gatekeeper for a long time, so he's
pretty good at it when it's his turn.<sp:0:4:0>I feel bad when it comes time for a
scaredy-cat like me to <clr:0000>guard the gate<clr:ffff>.
But I can't let a little kid do all the work.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was wondering if there was some way I
could romanticize eggs.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But in the end, eggs are something you
cook and eat for breakfast, and that's it.<sp:0:4:0>They say a Cucco's memory lasts for three
steps. If you promise to forget this whole
thing, I'll forget it too.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, uh, did you still need something?<sp:0:4:0>My son, Teebo, is doing a great job filling
in as village gatekeeper while my husband
is off at Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>I'm using my break now to look after my
Cuccos at home.<sp:0:4:0>But I'm sure my son would be happy to
<clr:0000>show you around town <clr:ffff>if you ask him.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oh, he's actually pretty handsome now that I get
a good look.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>Hey! I have a good idea. You should take
this and not ask any questions.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I should head back to work.<sp:0:4:0>The stores and barn are always open.
Take it easy, stranger.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Hey, do you know you're getting wet?
You need to get under a roof somewhere.
